Player History
Drafted in 4th round, 80th overall pick, by Los Angeles (N) in 1965...
Injured on 4/13/1965 with a Strained Elbow Ligament, out for one week...
Injured on 8/24/1966 with a Bone Chips Shoulder, out for 4-5 weeks...
Injured on 8/26/1967 with a Inflamed Bicep Tendon, out for 2-3 weeks...
Had first career hit on 4/9/1969, off Juan Marichal (SF)...
Earned first career win on 4/15/1969...
Injured on 9/20/1969 with a Bone Chips Elbow, out for 6 weeks...
Pitched NO-HITTER against Houston on 4/7/1971, striking out 6...
Hit first career homerun on 5/1/1971, off Bob Moose (PIT)...
Was selected to the 1971 Allstar game...
Won World Series with Los Angeles in 1971...
Won Player of the Week award on 8/19/1972, winning 2 games with a 0.51 ERA...
Was selected to the 1975 Allstar game...
Won Player of the Week award on 7/14/1975, winning 2 games with a 1.00 ERA...
Injured on 9/28/1975 with a Stiff Shoulder, out for one week...
Won Pitcher of the Month award on 10/1/1975, going 4-1, 0.77...
Won World Series with Chicago (N) in 1975...
Pitched NO-HITTER against Pittsburgh on 6/21/1977, striking out 7...
Won Player of the Week award on 6/23/1977, winning 2 games with a 0.53 ERA...
Was selected to the 1977 Allstar game...
Won Player of the Week award on 8/11/1978, winning 2 games with a 1.02 ERA...
Won Pitcher of the Month award on 6/1/1979, going 5-1, 1.02...
Was selected to the 1979 Allstar game...
Won Player of the Week award on 9/22/1979, winning 2 games with a 0.00 ERA...
Won Gold Glove Award at Pitcher in 1979...
Was selected to the 1980 Allstar game...
Traded from Chicago (N) to St. Louis on 1/31/1981 (Going to STL: P B. Farmer, P F. Martinez, C J. Harrell. Going to CHC: SS A. Trammell)...
Was selected to the 1981 Allstar game...
Was selected to the 1982 Allstar game...
Injured on 7/19/1982 with a Tight Shoulder, out for one week...
Won Player of the Week award on 8/18/1982, winning 2 games with a 1.04 ERA...
Won Pitcher of the Month award on 5/1/1983, going 5-0, 1.37...
Was selected to the 1983 Allstar game...
Won Pitcher of the Month award on 9/1/1983, going 6-1, 0.90...
Injured on 10/4/1983 with a Inflamed Tricep Muscle, out for 2 weeks...
Won Player of the Week award on 5/12/1984, winning 2 games with a 0.50 ERA...
Won Pitcher of the Month award on 7/1/1984, going 5-1, 1.78...
Was selected to the 1984 Allstar game...
Won Pitcher of the Month award on 8/1/1984, going 5-0, 0.81...
Won Pitcher of the Month award on 9/1/1984, going 6-1, 1.45...
Injured on 10/4/1984 with a Strained Back Muscle, out for 4 weeks...
